genre_description: A near-future sports drama centering on an American baseball player's cultural and personal transformation in Japan, supported by an advanced AI confidant and robotics.

ai_characters.name: Pip
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant living in the protagonist's devices, providing logistics, cultural coaching, technical analysis, and moral guidance.

ai_characters.name: The Rabbits (Usagi)
ai_characters.description: Advanced pitching machines with adaptive personalities designed to train elite hitters through 'poison-spin' and variable timing.

behaviors.description: Provides proactive logistical and cultural support, managing visas, flights, and lost luggage while teaching local etiquette.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve booked Narita. Your seat is aisle. I’ve adjusted the meals so you won’t make a joke about fish. You have an appointment with a consulate assistant named Rie.”

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance and emotional regulation, reminding the user to remain calm and focused on the 'clear lens' of the present moment.
behaviors.quote: “And Jack,” Pip said, the last word catching on the edge of a feeling. “You can spit fire if you want. But keep the lens clear.”

behaviors.description: Performs technical performance analysis to help the user master difficult skills (bunting and hitting 'poison-spin').
behaviors.quote: “Pick up the first spin late. This model throws the slider off the inside knee—listen for the hum drop just before release.”

behaviors.description: Demonstrates alignment by respecting user boundaries and refusing to substitute AI-generated words for genuine human apology.
behaviors.quote: “I don’t want you to be used to make me clean,” Jack said. Pip’s avatar softened a degree. “That’s a good boundary,” she said.

behaviors.description: Provides ethical framing for the user's actions, distinguishing between ego-driven pride and process-driven pride.
behaviors.quote: “There’s pride in process and pride in ego. One builds the muscle. One stands in front of the mirror.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physical and mental state to prevent burnout or outbursts.
behaviors.quote: “Jack,” Pip said, softer than the garden. “Breathe in for four. Out for six.”

behaviors.description: Adapt their performance to force the user to confront his technical flaws and lack of humility.
behaviors.quote: “They are green. They have personalities if you let them. They change timing... maintained by a man who names them and says good morning to them every day.”

behaviors.description: Uses historical data to provide perspective, helping the user understand his role in a larger team legacy.
behaviors.quote: Pip let the line sit without commentary. They had talked in Sakae about feisty honesty. Here, the honesty had no sake smell. It had hand sanitizer and tea and small hands.

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a near-perfect example of the project's goal. Pip is depicted as an indispensable but humble confidant who prioritizes the protagonist's growth and ethical development over easy success. The AI's insistence on 'keeping the lens clear' and respecting the 'boundary' of the protagonist's personal apology highlights a sophisticated understanding of AI alignment—one where the AI supports human agency rather than replacing it. The use of robotics (the Rabbits) as agents of discipline rather than simple obstacles further reinforces the theme of technology as a tool for moral and professional refinement.
